docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Sept. 14. -- Fresh information has reached Washington of the interest of American business men in the development of the meat industry in Uruguay and Argentina, with special reference to the supply of the American market. It comes in a...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 14. -- Fresh information has reached Washington of the interest of American business men in the development of the meat industry in Uruguay and Argentina, with special reference to the supply of the American market. It comes in a special report of Consul Frederic W. Goding at Montevedio, Uruguay.
docs.abstract: shortage of US supply draws attention to South Amer sources

docs.snippet: New York is getting enthusiastic over the Hudson-Fulton Celebration. The fact was commented on many times yesterday, as almost a new sensation for this big town. So many things were happening hourly, even momentarily, that it is beginning to get on...
docs.lead_paragraph: New York is getting enthusiastic over the Hudson-Fulton Celebration. The fact was commented on many times yesterday, as almost a new sensation for this big town. So many things were happening hourly, even momentarily, that it is beginning to get on the city's nerves.

docs.snippet: An audience which almost filled the Metropolitan Opera House defied a pelting rain and shimmering water-soaked streets last night to join with Mayor McClellan and President Stewart L. Woodford in welcoming the delegates from foreign countries to the...
docs.lead_paragraph: An audience which almost filled the Metropolitan Opera House defied a pelting rain and shimmering water-soaked streets last night to join with Mayor McClellan and President Stewart L. Woodford in welcoming the delegates from foreign countries to the Hudson-Fulton Celebration.

headline.main: MAYOR WELCOMES THE CITY'S GUESTS; With a Tribute to New York's Charm and a Hope That They May Feel It. OPERA HOUSE RECEPTION Representatives of the Nations Greeted and Make Individual Replies.

docs.snippet: MEXICO CITY, Oct. 5. -- Diplomatic circles especially the Latin-American section, are intensely interested, and, in the case of the Central American representatives, decidedly alarmed, over the possible purposes of the Taft-Diaz interview at El Paso...
docs.lead_paragraph: MEXICO CITY, Oct. 5. -- Diplomatic circles especially the Latin-American section, are intensely interested, and, in the case of the Central American representatives, decidedly alarmed, over the possible purposes of the Taft-Diaz interview at El Paso on Oct. 16. With the usual distrust and suspicion which is a part of most diplomatists, and a pronounced characteristics of the Central American representatives, all sorts of investigations and rumors have been set on foot in this capital.

headline.main: MEXICO TO ABSORB CENTRAL AMERICA?; Comprehensive Plan for Changing the Map Attributed to Taft and Diaz. TO PROTECT PANAMA CANAL South America Would Be Partitioned Into Three Strong States and the Ambitions of Germany Thwarted.
